job description:
Consider BASi as your next career move! Our team is known for our scientific expertise, responsiveness to clients, exemplary regulatory record, and helping our clients meet key milestones. We offer a small company feel where we work hard but have fun.

The Senior Scientist develops, documents, and validates bioanalytical methods. The successful candidate will be able to interpret data, troubleshoot methods, navigate current FDA expectations and provide guidance to clients. The ability to use multiple software packages and instrumentation, manage projects and communicate effectively is expected.
